original_text: The ax is already at the root of the trees, and every tree that does not produce good fruit will be cut down and thrown into the fire.
korean_text: 이미 도끼가 나무 뿌리에 놓였으니 좋은 열매를 맺지 아니하는 나무마다 찍혀 불에 던져지리라

sentences.original_text: The ax is already at the root of the trees
sentences.korean_translation: 도끼가 이미 나무 뿌리에 놓여 있으며

sentences.original_text: and every tree that does not produce good fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 좋은 열매를 맺지 못하는 모든 나무는
